mapper.sql: select ID, STOCK_OUT_CODE, BPM_KEY, PROCESS_ID, OUT_TIME, WAREHOUSE_ID, OUT_PERSON_ID, OUT_PERSON_NAME, OUT_TYPE, DESCRIPTON, STATUS, CREATE_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATOR, UPDATE_DATE FROM

#where() #set($_p = $_parameter.condition) #if($_p.id && $_p.id != '') #set($_id = $_p.id) AND ID LIKE @{_id} #end #if($_p.stockOutCode && $_p.stockOutCode != '') #set($_stockOutCode = '%' + $_p.stockOutCode + '%') AND STOCK_OUT_CODE LIKE @{_stockOutCode} #end #if($_p.bpmKey && $_p.bpmKey != '') #set($_bpmKey = '%' + $_p.bpmKey + '%') AND BPM_KEY LIKE @{_bpmKey} #end #if($_p.processId && $_p.processId != '') #set($_processId = $_p.processId) AND PROCESS_ID = @{_processId} #end #if($_p.warehouseId && $_p.warehouseId != '') #set($_warehouseId = $_p.warehouseId) AND WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_warehouseId} #end #if($_p.outType && $_p.outType != '') #set($_outType = $_p.outType) AND OUT_TYPE = @{_outType} #end
#if($_p.outTime && $_p.outTime != '') #set($_outTime = $_p.outTime) AND OUT_TIME = @{_outTime} #end #if($_p.startOutTime && $_p.startOutTime != '') #set($_startOutTime = $_p.startOutTime) AND OUT_TIME >= @{_startOutTime} #end #if($_p.endOutTime && $_p.endOutTime != '') #set($_endOutTime = $_p.endOutTime) AND OUT_TIME <= @{_endOutTime} #end #if($_p.outPersonId && $_p.outPersonId != '') #set($_outPersonId = $_p.outPersonId) AND OUT_PERSON_ID = @{_outPersonId} #end
#if($_p.outPersonName && $_p.outPersonName != '') #set($_outPersonName = '%' + $_p.outPersonName + '%') AND OUT_PERSON_NAME LIKE @{_outPersonName} #end #if($_p.status && $_p.status != '') #set($_status = $_p.status) AND STATUS = @{_status} #end
#end
mapper.select:
#set($_p = $_parameter.condition) select t.ID, t.STOCK_OUT_CODE, t.BPM_KEY, t.PROCESS_ID, t.OUT_TIME, t.WAREHOUSE_ID, t.OUT_PERSON_ID, t.OUT_PERSON_NAME, t.OUT_TYPE, t.DESCRIPTON, t.STATUS, t.CREATE_ID, t.CREATOR, t.CREATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_ID, t.UPDATOR, t.UPDATE_DATE, t1.WAREHOUSE_NAME warehouseName, t1.MANAGER_NAME managerName, t2.ENUM_TEXT statusName FROM STOCK_OUT t left join WAREHOUSE t1 on t.WAREHOUSE_ID=t1.id left join ENUM_DETAIL t2 on t.STATUS=t2.ENUM_VALUE and t2.TYPE_ID= @{_p.statusDictType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
#where()
#if($_p.id && $_p.id != '') #set($_id = $_p.id) AND ID LIKE @{_id} #end #if($_p.stockOutCode && $_p.stockOutCode != '') #set($_stockOutCode = '%' + $_p.stockOutCode + '%') AND STOCK_OUT_CODE LIKE @{_stockOutCode} #end #if($_p.bpmKey && $_p.bpmKey != '') #set($_bpmKey = '%' + $_p.bpmKey + '%') AND BPM_KEY LIKE @{_bpmKey} #end #if($_p.processId && $_p.processId != '') #set($_processId = $_p.processId) AND PROCESS_ID = @{_processId} #end #if($_p.warehouseId && $_p.warehouseId != '') #set($_warehouseId = $_p.warehouseId) AND WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_warehouseId} #end #if($_p.outType && $_p.outType != '') #set($_outType = $_p.outType) AND OUT_TYPE = @{_outType} #end
#if($_p.outTime && $_p.outTime != '') #set($_outTime = $_p.outTime) AND OUT_TIME = @{_outTime} #end #if($_p.startOutTime && $_p.startOutTime != '') #set($_startOutTime = $_p.startOutTime) AND OUT_TIME >= @{_startOutTime} #end #if($_p.endOutTime && $_p.endOutTime != '') #set($_endOutTime = $_p.endOutTime) AND OUT_TIME <= @{_endOutTime} #end #if($_p.outPersonId && $_p.outPersonId != '') #set($_outPersonId = $_p.outPersonId) AND OUT_PERSON_ID = @{_outPersonId} #end
#if($_p.outPersonName && $_p.outPersonName != '') #set($_outPersonName = '%' + $_p.outPersonName + '%') AND OUT_PERSON_NAME LIKE @{_outPersonName} #end #if($_p.status && $_p.status != '') #set($_status = $_p.status) AND STATUS = @{_status} #end
#end
#order($_parameter.condition,"t.ID DESC")

#set($_p = $_parameter.condition) select t.ID, t.STOCK_OUT_CODE, t.BPM_KEY, t.PROCESS_ID, t.OUT_TIME, t.WAREHOUSE_ID, t.OUT_PERSON_ID, t.OUT_PERSON_NAME, t.OUT_TYPE, t.DESCRIPTON, t.STATUS, t.CREATE_ID, t.CREATOR, t.CREATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_ID, t.UPDATOR, t.UPDATE_DATE, t1.WAREHOUSE_NAME warehouseName, t1.MANAGER_NAME managerName, t2.ENUM_TEXT statusName
#order($_parameter.condition,"t.ID DESC")
FROM STOCK_OUT t left join WAREHOUSE t1 on t.WAREHOUSE_ID=t1.id left join ENUM_DETAIL t2 on t.STATUS=t2.ENUM_VALUE and t2.TYPE_ID= @{_p.statusDictType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
#where() #set($_p = $_parameter.condition) #if($_p.id && $_p.id != '') #set($_id = $_p.id) AND ID LIKE @{_id} #end #if($_p.stockOutCode && $_p.stockOutCode != '') #set($_stockOutCode = '%' + $_p.stockOutCode + '%') AND STOCK_OUT_CODE LIKE @{_stockOutCode} #end #if($_p.bpmKey && $_p.bpmKey != '') #set($_bpmKey = '%' + $_p.bpmKey + '%') AND BPM_KEY LIKE @{_bpmKey} #end #if($_p.processId && $_p.processId != '') #set($_processId = $_p.processId) AND PROCESS_ID = @{_processId} #end #if($_p.warehouseId && $_p.warehouseId != '') #set($_warehouseId = $_p.warehouseId) AND WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_warehouseId} #end #if($_p.outType && $_p.outType != '') #set($_outType = $_p.outType) AND OUT_TYPE = @{_outType} #end
#if($_p.outTime && $_p.outTime != '') #set($_outTime = $_p.outTime) AND OUT_TIME = @{_outTime} #end #if($_p.startOutTime && $_p.startOutTime != '') #set($_startOutTime = $_p.startOutTime) AND OUT_TIME >= @{_startOutTime} #end #if($_p.endOutTime && $_p.endOutTime != '') #set($_endOutTime = $_p.endOutTime) AND OUT_TIME <= @{_endOutTime} #end #if($_p.outPersonId && $_p.outPersonId != '') #set($_outPersonId = $_p.outPersonId) AND OUT_PERSON_ID = @{_outPersonId} #end
#if($_p.outPersonName && $_p.outPersonName != '') #set($_outPersonName = '%' + $_p.outPersonName + '%') AND OUT_PERSON_NAME LIKE @{_outPersonName} #end #if($_p.status && $_p.status != '') #set($_status = $_p.status) AND STATUS = @{_status} #end
#end

select a.ID, a.STOCK_OUT_CODE, a.BPM_KEY, a.PROCESS_ID, a.OUT_TIME, a.WAREHOUSE_ID, a.OUT_PERSON_ID, a.OUT_PERSON_NAME, a.OUT_TYPE, a.DESCRIPTON, a.STATUS, a.CREATE_ID, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_DATE, a.UPDATE_ID, a.UPDATOR, a.UPDATE_DATE, d.WAREHOUSE_NAME warehouseName, d.MANAGER_NAME managerName, b.ID d_ID, b.STOCK_OUT_ID d_STOCK_OUT_ID, b.SPARE_ID d_SPARE_ID, b.QTY d_QTY, b.AVAILABLE_QTY d_AVAILABLE_QTY, b.PRC d_PRC, b.MONEY d_MONEY, b.REMARK d_REMARK, c.spare_Code d_SPARE_CODE, c.spare_Name d_SPARE_NAME, c.spec d_SPEC, c.model d_MODEL from STOCK_OUT a left join STOCK_OUT_DETAIL b on a.ID = b.STOCK_OUT_ID LEFT JOIN SPARE c on c.id=b.SPARE_ID LEFT JOIN WAREHOUSE d on d.id=a.WAREHOUSE_ID WHERE a.ID = @{_parameter, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
